Reviews.Author: rsthomas11
Reviews.Content: stayed valentines weekend paris hotel situated minutes walk ecole militaire metro station easy visit mustsee paris hanging space weekend fine clean maid changed bedding towels day 5th floor top third eiffel tower bonus didnt expect couldnt hear guests sometimes hear showers running communal downside lift action monfri hard day walking paris staff friendly spoke english floors free internet wifi access contact home easily dont book direct advertised paid £120 via eurostar website shop booking

Reviews.Title: “Great Paris hotel for families with small kids”

Reviews.Content: chose hotel located quaint neighborhood near eiffel tower rodin museum werent disappointed hotel cool trendy comfortable kids loved quirky design easy location quick walk eiffel tower parks seine metro station 2 blocks kids friends sweet woman owns bistro street chocolate crepes breakfast morning served awardwinning cafe au lait french food hotel restaurant block eaten day add cheese shop street cooks shop bit bakery corner grocery store little parisian avenue note hotel breakfast fantastic designer chocolate macaroon retailer located lobby brought bunch home share friends suite stayed perfect family queen bed plus twins extra twin doubled couch plenty appointed kids loved bathroom shower literally center walls curtains price wondering
